personal.name: Leonardo Secotaro
personal.title: Staff Engineer
personal.bio: Experienced Staff Engineer with expertise in software architecture, team leadership, and scalable system design. Passionate about building high-performance applications and mentoring development teams.

experience.description: Leading technical architecture decisions and mentoring senior engineers. Designed and implemented scalable microservices architecture serving millions of users.
achievements: Reduced system latency by 40% through architecture optimization

experience.description: Developed high-performance web applications and APIs. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver complex software solutions.
achievements: Built real-time analytics platform processing 1M+ events/day
Implemented automated testing reducing bugs by 60%
Led frontend architecture migration to React

experience.description: Developed end-to-end web applications for various clients. Worked with modern JavaScript frameworks and backend technologies.
achievements: Delivered 15+ client projects on time and budget
Introduced modern development practices and tools
